Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-22870 affecting package git-lfs for versions less than 3.6.1-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-22870 affecting package git-lfs for versions less than 3.6.1-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package git-lfs is earlier than 3.6.1-2, affected by CVE-2025-22870
